name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Support Engineer with a robust analytical and problem-solving skill set, backed by exceptional communication and teamwork abilities. Leveraging over 10 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer delivering high-performance software solutions across various sectors including healthcare and finance. Proficient in understanding complex systems related to **semiconductor**, **optics**, **electro-mechanical**, and **electro-optical** domains. Strong foundation in technologies such as **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, with hands-on experience designing innovative solutions for real-world applications. Experienced in cloud deployment on **Azure** and **AWS**, with a strong emphasis on compliance and security standards including HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Proven capability in managing customer relationships by providing exceptional service and technical support. Passionate about driving impact through technology, mentoring teams, and fostering collaborative environments.
